sections.title: Setup Quickstart
bullets: Submit KYC documents and tax forms before filming
Lock in a studio corner with flattering key + fill lighting
Test stream quality on desktop and mobile viewers

sections.title: Schedule Plan
bullets: Block two anchor shows during your highest-traffic evenings
Add one rotating weekend slot for discovery
Publish availability in room topic + socials

sections.title: Price Ladder
bullets: Create a three-tier menu: warmup, core experience, premium upsell
Bundle 3- and 6-month fan club offers with limited perks
Refresh tip goals weekly to reflect demand

sections.title: Show Structure
bullets: Open with a 5-minute welcome and chat prompts
Rotate between tease, request, and high-energy segments
Close with tomorrow's teaser and gratitude roll

sections.title: Safety Stack
bullets: Enable geo-blocking and banned word filters
Use a moderator or trusted friend during first streams
Document boundaries, no-gos, and red-flag escalation plan

sections.title: Metrics & Review
bullets: Track peak viewers, conversion rate, and median tip
Log show notes in a spreadsheet after every session
Adjust menu + schedule based on two-week trend
